item.title: XSS Hunting: Risks of document.write and Detection Strategies
item.description: The document.write method in JavaScript remains a critical vector for Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities. While it dynamically injects HTML content, improper handling of user input can enable attackers to execute arbitrary scripts. This article explores practical techniques to identify and mitigate risks associated with document.write, supported by real-world cases and defensive frameworks.
